document_data.name: Scrying Eye
document_data.mainbody:
A '''''scrying eye''''' was a [[magic]] device that allowed someone to view an area far away from their present location.

{{Quote|You see that eye wotsit floatin' about? Best hope it don't take a fancy to you...unless you like playin' hide an' seek when yer tryin' to take a dump.|The goblin [[Skrut]].}}
document_data.Description: A ''scrying eye'' resembled a glassy lidless eye that floated some height above the ground.
document_data.Powers:
Some ''scrying eyes'' were crafted with ''[[truesight]]'', allowing them to see through [[illusion]]s and into the [[ethereal plane]].

Anyone gazing into, and being viewed by, the eye could reach out to feel a connection with whomever or whatever was on its "other side". Tapping into that connection may see their own image reflected in the eye, falling into itself into eternity.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, [[Cult of the Absolute|cultists of the Absolute]] from [[Moonrise Towers]] used ''scrying eyes'' to keep appraised of their subordinates in the [[Shattered Sanctum]] and [[Grymforge]].
document_data.Notable Owners: Some [[archfey]] were known to utilize ''scrying eye''s.
